name: Jitsu
description: Jitsu is a real-time data collection platform. Beta version. More about Jitsu: https://jitsu.com

CLUSTER_ADMIN_TOKEN.description: Admin token for managing Jitsu through diagnostics HTTP API (https://jitsu.com/docs/other-features/admin-endpoints). You can leave it autogenerated, but on each server restart you'll need to update your HTTP scripts (if you have any). The value can be any random string number

GEO_MAXMIND_PATH.description: (Optional) If you want Jitsu to resolve location-based data (Coutry, City, etc) based on IP address, provide 'maxmind://<YOUR_MAXMIND_LICENSE_KEY>' or custom HTTP URL to hosted Maxmind DB file. You can leave it blank, it this case location-resolution won't work. See https://jitsu.com/docs/other-features/geo-data-resolution for details

SLACK_NOTIFICATIONS_WEBHOOK.description: (Optional) Slack webhook URL. Server starts, system errors, and panics information will be sent there.

JITSU_SSO_CONFIG.description: (Optional) Jitsu SSO configuration. See https://jitsu.com/docs/other-features/sso for details

SMTP_HOST.description: (Optional) For using reset/forgot password feature - configure SMTP Host for sending emails.

SMTP_PORT.description: (Optional) For using reset/forgot password feature - configure SMTP Port for sending emails.

SMTP_USER.description: (Optional) For using reset/forgot password feature - configure SMTP User for sending emails.

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: (Optional) For using reset/forgot password feature - configure SMTP Password for sending emails.

ENVIRONMENT.description: (Advanced) Deployment environment. Leave it unless you know what you do

TLS_SKIP_VERIFY.description: (Advanced) Heroku Redis requires TLS_SKIP_VERIFY=true. Leave it unless you know what you do

SERVER_CONFIGURATOR_REDIRECT_HTTPS.description: (Advanced) Heroku deployments requires SERVER_CONFIGURATOR_REDIRECT_HTTPS=true. Leave it unless you know what you do
